resources.string: Battery protect
OK
Caution High Temperature
Cooling Down
Normal Temperature
Please shut down call and applications to cool down the phone.
Current the phone is in Cool Down mode, emergency call only.
Normal operation has resumed.
Emergency call
Maximum temperature
Phone temperature is too high, will be shut down now.
Charging stop
Stop charging!
Phone has exited Warning mode. Normal operation has resumed.
Phone has exited Cool Down mode. Normal operation has resumed.
Phone has exited Maximum Temperature mode. Normal operation has resumed.
Alert
Temperature is too low, stop charging.
The temperature is out of range
Can not detect the battery temperature, make sure the battery is properly installed, otherwise it will not charge.
Can not detect the battery temperature.
make sure the battery is properly installed, otherwise it will not charge.
Currently unable to detect the battery temperature, and the phone is in Cool Down mode, only making an emergency call, make sure the battery is installed correctly.
Battery Wizard

Dear InFocus customer, since the cell phone battery is considered as a consumable part, if you find that the battery endurance of your phone has been reduced significantly, please take your phone to the dealer for diagnose and repair to ensure your phone is kept operating in its best condition. If you have any question, please contact our Customer Service Center, telephone %1$s. Thank you.
Please contact our Customer Service Center, telephone %1$s Thank you.

Dear InFocus customer, since the cell phone battery is considered as a consumable part, if you find that the battery endurance of your phone has been reduced significantly, please take your phone to the dealer for diagnose and repair to ensure your phone is kept operating in its best condition. If you have any question, please contact our Customer Service Center.Thank you.
Please contact our Customer Service Center, Thank you.
Lower The Brightness Alert
Phone’s temperature is higher than normal, lower the brightness to cool down the phone
Charging completed
Cancel
Power off
The maximum charging limit has been reached at high temperatures! When the phone temperature returns to normal, the system will continue to charge at normal speed.
The maximum charging limit has been reached at low temperatures! When the phone temperature returns to normal, the system will continue to charge at normal speed.
High temp charging limit reached
Low temp charging limit reached
General notifications
High temperature
Cooling
Temperature is normal
We offer to lower the screen brightness and turn off the application to cool the device.
At present, the device is in heat-dissipating mode and you can only make emergency calls.
The phone has resumed normal operation.
The maximum warning temperature has been reached
The device is at a high temperature and shutdown will be performed
Low temperature
The device is at a low temperature, so it will not be charged.
Currently, the battery temperature cannot be detected, and the device is in heat-dissipating mode. Only make emergency calls. Make sure the battery is properly installed.
Battery elf
Battery elf

Dear InFocus users, because the battery inside the device is a consumable, please send the device to the agent for testing and maintenance to ensure that the operating performance of your device can be maintained in the best condition if you find its battery life has decreased significantly in the use of the device. If there is any problem, welcome to call customer service center, phone number %1$s, thank you.

Dear InFocus users, because the battery inside the device is a consumable, please send the device to the agent for testing and maintenance to ensure that the operating performance of your device can be maintained in the best condition if you find its battery life has decreased significantly in the use of the device. If there is any problem, welcome to call customer service center. Thank you.
High temperature
Stop charging!
Poor battery contact
Battery temperature has exceeded the specified range
Make sure that the battery is properly installed
The device is at a high temperature, so it will not be charged.
The battery is charged completely
Cancel
At present, the device is in heat-dissipating mode, and please use later
Watch temperature is too high! We recommend dimming the screen and turning off the application. Are you sure you want to perform it?
The watch resumes normal operation.
The watch has reached the high temperature limit, about to shut down!
The watch is at a low temperature and charging will be stopped.
Please use original battery
Charging stopped
Please use the original battery to charge, or you could cause permanent/physical damage to your device.
The battery is invalid
Cooling down
Tap to learn more.

"Your phone is getting hot, so it's taking steps to cool itself down. You can still use it, but you may notice: ·Charging might pause. ·Wi-Fi might be turned off. ·Applications might be closed. ·Airplane mode might be turned on. Your phone will return to normal once it cools down."
